site.title: ceycodex - Code that Connects. Solutions that Scale.

hero.headline: Code that Connects. Solutions that Scale.
hero.subheadline: We partner with global brands and innovative startups to build future-ready software that solves real-world problems.

services.headline: What We Do
services.subheadline: Our expertise, your vision. We provide end-to-end digital solutions.

cards.title: Custom Software Development
cards.description: Tailored software built from scratch to meet your unique business requirements, from backend to frontend.

cards.title: Mobile App Development
cards.description: Engaging and high-performance native and cross-platform mobile apps for both iOS and Android.

cards.title: Cloud & DevOps
cards.description: Scalable cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and automation to streamline your development and deployment.

cards.title: AI & Data Science
cards.description: Leverage the power of your data with machine learning models, predictive analytics, and intelligent automation.

projects.headline: Our Recent Work
projects.subheadline: Showcasing our latest projects and success stories.

cards.title: FinFuture Analytics Platform
cards.summary: A real-time data analytics dashboard for a leading fintech startup, increasing data processing speed by 300%.

cards.title: CareConnect Mobile App
cards.summary: A HIPAA-compliant telehealth app connecting patients with doctors, featuring secure video chat and appointment booking.

cards.title: EcoMarket E-commerce
cards.summary: A fully custom, high-traffic e-commerce solution for a sustainable goods retailer, integrated with a custom CMS.

careers.headline: Join Our Team
careers.subheadline: We're always looking for passionate, talented, and creative people to join our mission.
careers.intro: Explore our open roles and find your fit at ceycodex.

positions.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer (Remote)
positions.description: 5+ years experience with React and Python (Django/Flask). Strong understanding of database design and a passion for clean code.

positions.title: Product Manager
positions.description: Proven track record of managing software products from ideation to launch. Excellent communication and prioritization skills.
